setting.label: Keyboard shortcut key (single character, used with CTRL modifier)
setting.tooltip: The keyboard shortcut will be CTRL+[this key]. For example, setting this to 'e' will create a CTRL+E shortcut. This avoids conflicts with Kodi's default keybindings.

setting.label: Predefined Segment Labels
setting.tooltip: Comma-separated list of predefined labels for segments. These will appear in a dropdown when adding/editing segments.

setting.label: Save Format
setting.values: Auto Detect|EDL Only|Chapter XML Only|Both Formats
setting.tooltip: Choose which format to save segments in. 'Auto Detect' uses the format of existing files, or EDL if none exist.

setting.label: Action Mapping
setting.tooltip: Format: action_type:label. Example: 4:Segment,5:Intro,6:Ad,7:Credits. Action type number is used for EDL file, label is used for chapter XML file.

setting.label: Set File Permissions (666)
setting.tooltip: Attempt to set file permissions to 666 (rw-rw-rw-) after saving. Only works for local filesystem paths, not network paths (nfs://, smb://). For network paths, permissions are controlled by the server.

setting.label: Enable Full-Screen Dark Overlay
setting.tooltip: When enabled, darkens the entire video screen behind the editor dialog. When disabled, the video remains fully visible, making it easier to see the video while setting start and end times.
